content: It's said that receiving Dough that contains the blessings of a friend can bring about a change in your luck. You'll see things starting to go smoothly, yeep~!
info: NPC特色交互-幻雪-占卜_幻雪

content: This <style=Highlight>{占卜奖励}</style> is for you. Please do try what the prophecy suggests. I can't wait to see the butterflies soaring through the sea of flowers, yeep~!
info: NPC特色交互-幻雪-占卜_幻雪

content:
Here, take this <style=Highlight>{占卜奖励}</style> as well. They say these plants can enhance your fortune too.
<style=SizeSmall>I wonder what kind of flowers bloom on other planets...</style>
info: NPC特色交互-幻雪-占卜_幻雪

content: Don't worry, I'm giving this <style=Highlight>{占卜奖励}</style> to you as a gift of prophecy. I assure you, this time it's purely a pleasant surprise, no scares~
info: NPC特色交互-幻雪-占卜_幻雪

content: "Everyone possesses their own unique power. On the <style=Highlight>journey across the Starsea </style>, different companions offer <style=Highlight>different kinds of support</style>..."
info: NPC特色交互-幻雪-占卜_幻雪

content: "When <style=Highlight>the same crops</style> are planted together, they're more likely to produce peculiar varieties, though... they also tend to attract more pests."
info: NPC特色交互-幻雪-占卜_幻雪

content: {A思考星光}What a peculiar prophecy, yeep~? It seems to be about exchanging something... Flowers, maybe? In a place where people gather.
info: NPC特色交互-幻雪-占卜_幻雪

content: "When <style=Highlight>flowers bloom together</style>, they shall draw <style=Highlight>butterflies</style> to rest upon them..."
info: NPC特色交互-幻雪-占卜_幻雪

content: {A想象}Aspects and degrees... cosmic intersections. The guardians rise... day and night, passing through... Yeep?! This sign...{短暂停}
info: NPC特色交互-幻雪-占卜_幻雪

content: But, like the flow of wind and fate, {A喜欢}connecting with friends will surely bring good fortune~!
info: NPC特色交互-幻雪-占卜_幻雪

content: {A思考星光}What a peculiar prophecy, yeep~? No one knows where shooting stars come from even now... Perhaps I should try catching a few?
info: NPC特色交互-幻雪-占卜_幻雪

content: Oh right, here's [article_or_num:1,{占卜奖励}] <style=Highlight>[quant_noun:1,{占卜奖励}]</style> for you. These butterflies always bring me good fortune. Perhaps they'll help you catch more shooting stars, yeep~!
info: NPC特色交互-幻雪-占卜_幻雪

content: {A思考星光}What a peculiar prophecy, yeep~? I hope this helps you, just like this "Lucky Dough"...
info: NPC特色交互-幻雪-占卜_幻雪

content: "If <style=Highlight>planted</style> <style=Highlight>too close</style> together, trees will never grow tall."
info: NPC特色交互-幻雪-占卜_幻雪

content: It's said that receiving Dough that contains the blessings of a friend can bring about a change in your luck. So, I'm giving it to you along with the prophecy.
info: NPC特色交互-幻雪-占卜_幻雪

content: "Different planets bloom with different fragrances. At the <style=Highlight>place where all paths meet</style>, gift flowers to others, and <style=Highlight>receive blooms yet unseen</style>."
info: NPC特色交互-幻雪-占卜_幻雪

content: {A思考星光}What a peculiar prophecy, yeep~? Could it be... some kind of way to attract butterflies?
info: NPC特色交互-幻雪-占卜_幻雪

content: {A思考星光}What a peculiar prophecy, yeep~? Speaking of companions... oh right, please accept this "Lucky Dough."
info: NPC特色交互-幻雪-占卜_幻雪

content: {A思考星光}What a peculiar prophecy, yeep~? It seems to be about some kind of surprise, or maybe a scare?
info: NPC特色交互-幻雪-占卜_幻雪

content: "A <style=Highlight>shooting star</style> streaking across the sky... A mischievous little star escaping from the Starsea only comes to rest when caught in an <style=Highlight>insect net</style>."
info: NPC特色交互-幻雪-占卜_幻雪
